english.segment1: I have been unfaithful. I have been unworthy. I have been unrighteous. And I have been unmerciful
english.segment2: I have been unreachable. I have been unteachable. I have been unwilling. And I have been undesirable
english.segment3: And sometimes I have unwise. I've been undone by what I'm unsure of. But because of You. And all that You went through. I know that I have never been unloved
english.segment4: I have been unbroken. I have been unmended. I have been uneasy. And I've been unapproachable
english.segment5: I've been unemotional. I've been unexceptional. I've been undecided. And I have been unqualified
english.segment6: Unaware. I have been unfair. I've been unfit for blessings from above. But even I can see. The sacrifice You made for me. To show that I have never been unloved
english.segment7: It's because of You. And all that You went through. I know that I have never been unloved
